The Slimming Tea and Solution (Powder) Combo is a comprehensive weight loss program that combines the benefits of two powerful natural remedies: slimming tea and slimming solution powder.

Slimming tea is a type of herbal tea that is made from a blend of herbs that have been shown to boost metabolism, improve digestion, and reduce inflammation. Some of the most common herbs used in slimming tea include green tea, ginger, and oolong tea.

Slimming solution powder is a type of dietary supplement that is made from a blend of ingredients that have been shown to promote weight loss. Some of the most common ingredients used in slimming solution powder include garcinia cambogia and green coffee bean extract.

Quick Facts:

The Slimming Tea and Solution (Powder) Combo is claimed to offer several benefits for weight loss, including:

  • Boosted metabolism
  • Improved digestion
  • Reduced inflammation
  • Suppressed appetite
  • Increased energy levels

  • Improved mood

entry.title: Slimming Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 2250.00

Slimming tea is a type of herbal tea that is claimed to help promote weight loss. It is typically made from a blend of herbs, such as green tea, ginger, and oolong tea, that have been shown to boost metabolism, improve digestion, and reduce inflammation.

Quick Facts:

  • Some herbs, such as green tea and ginger, can help boost metabolism, which can lead to increased calorie burning.
  • Some herbs, such as peppermint and fennel, can help to improve digestion, which can help to reduce bloating and constipation.
  • Some herbs, such as turmeric and chamomile, have anti-inflammatory properties, which can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body.

How to Use

  • Twice a Day: Consume it twice daily, in the morning and before bedtime.
  • Simple Preparation: Steep a tea bag or loose-leaf tea in hot water for 3-5 minutes.
  • Customize Flavor: Add honey or lemon to tailor the taste to your liking.

It is important to note that slimming tea is not a magic bullet for weight loss. It is important to combine slimming tea with a healthy diet and exercise routine to achieve sustainable results.

Slimming Solution is a natural herbal drink carefully crafted to support your weight management goals. Blended with a selection of botanical ingredients, this drink offers a refreshing and holistic approach to achieving your desired fitness levels.

Quick Facts:

  1. Weight Management: Slimming Solution aids in controlling and reducing body weight through its natural components.
  2. Metabolic Boost: It contains ingredients known to support a healthy metabolism, potentially assisting in fat burning.
  3. Detoxification: This herbal drink may help cleanse your system by promoting detoxification, leading to a revitalized feeling.
  4. Appetite Control: By potentially helping control your appetite, it may discourage overeating and unhealthy snacking.
  5. Energy Enhancement: You can enjoy a natural energy boost that keeps you active and invigorated throughout the day.

How to Use:

  1. Brewing: Boil water and pour it into a cup.
  2. Steeping: Add a Slimming Solution tea bag to the hot water.
  3. Wait: Allow it to steep for 3-5 minutes to extract the herbal goodness.
  4. Flavor Enhancement: If desired, add a touch of honey or lemon to enhance the taste.
  5. Frequency: For optimal results, consume this herbal drink twice daily, preferably in the morning and before bedtime.

Incorporate Slimming Solution into your daily routine as a delightful and supportive step toward your wellness journey.

entry.title: Salajeet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1800.00 - 3600.00 (2 variants)

Shilajit, also known as salajeet, is a natural substance that is formed over centuries by the gradual decomposition of plants and other organic matter in the rocks of the Himalayas. It is a sticky, tar-like substance that is dark brown or black. Shilajit has been used in traditional medicine for centuries for a variety of ailments.

Quick Facts:

Some of the potential health benefits of shilajit include:

  • Improved energy levels: Shilajit has been shown to improve energy levels in people with chronic fatigue syndrome.
  • Reduced inflammation: Shilajit has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body.
  • Improved cognitive function: Shilajit has been shown to improve cognitive function in people with Alzheimer's disease and other forms of dementia.
  • Boosted immune system: Shilajit is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system.
  • Improved heart health: Shilajit has been shown to improve heart health by lowering cholesterol levels and reducing blood pressure.
  • Increased testosterone levels: Shilajit has been shown to increase testosterone levels in men.

For Men:

  • Increased testosterone levels: Shilajit has been shown to increase testosterone levels in men. This can lead to several benefits, including increased muscle mass, improved bone density, and enhanced sexual performance.
  • Improved fertility: Shilajit has also been shown to improve fertility in men. It can help to increase sperm count and motility, and it can also improve the quality of sperm DNA.
  • Boosted sexual performance: Shilajit can also help to boost sexual performance in men. It can help to increase libido, improve erectile function, and delay ejaculation.

For Women:

  • Regulated hormones: Shilajit can help to regulate hormones in women. This can be beneficial for women of all ages, but it is especially beneficial for women who are going through menopause.
  • Improved mood: Shilajit can also help to improve mood in women. It can help to reduce stress, anxiety, and depression.
  • Reduced symptoms of menopause: Shilajit can help to reduce the symptoms of menopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, and mood swings.

It is important to note that shilajit can interact with certain medications, such as blood thinners and diabetes medications. It is important to talk to your doctor before taking shilajit if you are taking any medications.

How to Use

Here are a few tips for using Shilajit:

  • Mix shilajit powder with warm milk or water and drink it on an empty stomach.
  • Take shilajit capsules with food.
  • Add shilajit liquid to your favorite smoothie or juice.
  • Apply shilajit topically to the skin to reduce inflammation and promote wound healing.

Additional tips:

  • Shilajit can be taken in a variety of forms, including capsules, powder, and liquid. The recommended dosage of shilajit varies depending on the form that you are taking. It is important to start with a low dose and gradually increase the dosage as tolerated.
  • If you are pregnant or breastfeeding, it is important to talk to your doctor before taking shilajit.
  • Shilajit is a natural substance, but it is important to buy it from a reputable source.

entry.title: Saffron
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 900.00 - 1530.00 (2 variants)

Saffron is a spice derived from the flower of the saffron crocus, a plant native to Southwest Asia. The spice is known for its vibrant red color, intense aroma, and slightly bitter taste. Saffron is one of the most expensive spices in the world, due to the labor-intensive process of harvesting and processing the stigmas of the saffron crocus flower.

Quick Facts:

  • Improved mood and reduced symptoms of depression: Saffron is effective in treating mild to moderate depression. It is thought that saffron may work by increasing levels of serotonin and dopamine in the brain.
  • Enhanced cognitive function: Saffron has been shown to improve memory, learning, and attention. It is thought that saffron may work by protecting brain cells from damage.
  • Reduced inflammation: Saffron has anti-inflammatory properties that may help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved heart health: Saffron has been shown to lower cholesterol levels and blood pressure. It may also help to protect against heart attack and stroke.
  • Antioxidant protection: Saffron is a rich source of antioxidants, which can help to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals. Free radicals are unstable molecules that can contribute to aging and the development of chronic diseases.

How to Use

  • Culinary Delight: Saffron is a staple in Middle Eastern and Indian dishes, adding its distinct flavor and color.
  • Beverage Elevation: Enhance your tea, coffee, or milk by infusing it with saffron's aromatic essence.
Supplement Option: Saffron threads can be consumed as a dietary supplement to potentially harness their health benefits.

entry.title: Pure and natural Desi Ghee (1kg)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 2565.00

Pure and natural desi ghee is a clarified butter that is made from the milk of cows that have been fed on grass. It is a golden-colored, semi-solid substance with a rich, nutty flavor. Desi ghee is a staple in Indian cuisine and is used in a variety of dishes, both sweet and savory. 

Quick Facts:

Desi ghee has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved digestion: Desi ghee is a good source of butyrate, a short-chain fatty acid that has been shown to promote gut health. Butyrate can help to improve digestion and absorption of nutrients.
  • Boosted immune system: Desi ghee is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Reduced inflammation: Desi ghee has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved heart health: Desi ghee has been shown to lower cholesterol levels and blood pressure. It may also help to protect against heart attack and stroke.
  • Enhanced cognitive function: Desi ghee has been shown to improve memory, learning, and attention. It is thought that desi ghee may work by protecting brain cells from damage.

How to Use

Desi ghee can be used in a variety of ways. It is a common ingredient in Indian cuisine and is used in a variety of dishes, both sweet and savory. Desi ghee can also be used as a spread for toast or bread, or as a cooking oil.

Here are a few specific ways to use desi ghee:

  • Add it to dal (lentils) or rice for a rich, nutty flavor.
  • Use it to make ghee roast chicken or fish.
  • Add it to your morning smoothie for a boost of energy.
  • Use it as a hair mask to nourish your scalp and hair.
  • Apply it to your skin as a moisturizer

entry.title: Gastric Relief
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1800.00

Gastric relief powder is the herbal blend that is designed to help relieve the symptoms of indigestion, heartburn, and other gastric problems. It is typically made from a combination of herbs that have been used in traditional medicine for centuries to soothe the digestive system. 

Some of the most common herbs used in gastric relief powder include:

  • Ginger: Ginger is a natural anti-inflammatory that can help to reduce inflammation in the digestive tract. It can also help to stimulate digestion and relieve nausea.
  • Fennel: Fennel is a carminative herb that can help to expel gas and relieve bloating. It can also help to stimulate digestion.
  • Cumin: Cumin is a digestive aid that can help to stimulate the production of digestive enzymes. It can also help to relieve gas and bloating.
  • Ajwain: Ajwain is a carminative herb that can help to expel gas and relieve bloating. It can also help to stimulate digestion.
  • Mint: Mint is a cooling herb that can help to soothe the digestive tract. It can also help to relieve nausea and vomiting.

Quick Facts:

Gastric relief powder can help to relieve a variety of gastric problems, including:

  • Indigestion
  • Heartburn
  • Gas
  • Bloating
  • Nausea
  • Vomiting
  • Stomach cramps

How to Use

  • Oral or Diluted: Administer gastric relief powder orally or after mixing it with water.
  • Dosage Guidance: Follow the specific dosage instructions provided on the product label.

Versatile Relief: Use as needed to alleviate symptoms or regularly for preventive gastric care.

entry.title: Boostmatic (Men's Health)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 3780.00

Boostmatic (Men's Health) is a natural supplement designed to improve men's sexual health. Boostmatic (Men's Health) is made from natural extracts like Yohimbe bark, Tribulus terrestris, horny goat weed, ginseng root, maca root, and ginkgo leaf. These ingredients are aimed at addressing problems like difficulty getting or maintaining an erection, releasing semen too quickly, having a low sperm count and other health issues men face. These extracts work by making blood vessels wider, which helps improve the flow of blood to the penis. They also increase testosterone levels, improve the quantity and quality of sperm, boost desire and performance, and enhance overall energy, stamina, and immunity. 

Quick Facts:

Boostmatic (Men's Health) is claimed to have several benefits for men's sexual health, including:

  • Improved penile blood flow
  • Increased testosterone levels
  • Boosted libido
  • Enhanced stamina
  • Increased energy
  • Treatment of erectile dysfunction
  • Treatment of premature ejaculation
  • Improved sperm count
  • Improved sperm motility
  • Improved sperm quality
  • Promoted male fertility
